description:
This course is for anyone who wishes to have a happier and more fulfilled life!

Discover Your Dream Job is the most thorough job discovery course out there!!

It consists of:

  • 93 time-tested, dynamic, fun, creative, engaging, and insightful VIDEO TUTORIALS; approximately 14 hours of information.
  • 1 inspirational & interactive 300 page E-WORKBOOK that will keep you fully captivated and engaged 100% of the time.
  • Participation with other like-minded Dream Job Explorers on Facebook.
  • E-mail support from David.
  • Free monthly newsletter.
  • Discounts off private coaching sessions with David!
  • Discounts off future courses!
title: Discover Your Dream Job
